headline: How a New Illinois RNG Landfill Project Could Shape Republic Services' (RSG) Clean Energy Strategy
summary: Ameresco and Republic Services have brought a renewable natural gas facility at the Upper Rock Island County Landfill in Illinois into operation, converting landfill gas into pipeline-quality fuel and helping cut more than 27,000 metric tons of CO2 emissions annually. This project, the 16th the partners have developed together, strengthens Republic Services’ progress toward biogas reuse goals while supporting Illinois’ clean energy targets. We’ll now examine how this new renewable natural...
